definition[0]: to store something secretly or safely somewhere
example[0]: He has money stashed away in the Bahamas.
example[1]: You can stash your gear in here.
definition[1]: an amount of something that is kept in a secret place, especially money, weapons, or drugs
example[2]: Mike went into the bedroom to check on his stash.
definition[2]: to store something, especially money, in a safe, often secret place
example[4]: The multi-millionaire apparently had Â£250 million stashed in overseas accounts.
